T02D1597:116a-0: @116a * // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs//
T02D1597:116a-2: # // bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1597:116a-3: dang po re zhig dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D1597:116a-4: dgongs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1597:116a-5: las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D1597:116a-6: sbyin sreg gi bya ba byed par 'dod pa'i sngags
T02D1597:116a-7: pas gru gsum gyi rnam pa'i thab khung byas te
T02D1597:116a-8: rgya'i phyed dpangs su kha khyer dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1597:116a-9: kha dog dmar po la sogs pa legs par byugs
T02D1597:116a-10: la nub tu mngon par phyogs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1597:116a-11: rim pas nye bar gnas la //
T02D1597:116a-12: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1597:116a-13: thab khung du bud shing brtsigs pa dang /
T02D1597:116a-14: ram gyi sa bon las byung ba'i me lha kha dog dmar po rnam par bsgom ste /
T02D1597:116a-15: spyi blugs dang mi 'jigs pa dang dbyig pa dang phreng ba rnams phyag na 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1597:116a-16: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1597:116a-17: yang dag par mchod pa ni /
T02D1597:116a-18: de'i lce la ram bkod la /
T02D1597:116a-19: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D1597:116a-23: sngags de nyid kyis dgang blugs kyang dbul lo //
T02D1597:116a-24: de nas de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag
T02D1597:116a-25: nyid me'i dbus su dkyil 'khor lhag par mos par
T02D1597:116a-26: byas te / mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1597:116a-27: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas la /
T02D1597:116a-28: lha mo dang lha mo'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1597:116a-29: zhi la sreg rdzas mngar sogs te //
T02D1597:116a-30: rgyas pa la yang mngar ba nyid //
T02D1597:116a-31: dbang la mngar dang lan tshva yin //
T02D1597:116a-32: drag la tshva dang kha sogs kyis //
T02D1597:116a-33: zhi la dkar po'i gzugs kyis te //
T02D1597:116a-34: rgyas la ser po rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1597:116a-35: dbang la dmar po zhes su brjod //
T02D1597:116a-36: drag la nag por rab tu grags //
T02D1597:116a-37: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su ni ;
T02D1597:116a-38: / dmar po yang ni rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1597:116a-39: de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang bzhin gyis lus la bcug ste /
T02D1597:116a-40: gtor ma byin nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pas /
T02D1597:116a-41: 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1597:116b-0: bdag nyid gang 'dod pa'i dngos @116b grub blang bar bya'o //
T02D1597:116b-1: gsal por sbyin sreg 'di mi bya //
T02D1597:116b-2: 'bad pas gsang bar bya ba ste //
T02D1597:116b-4: gzhan du dngos grub skal ba med //
T02D1597:116b-5: yang dag dad pas rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1597:116b-6: sngags rnams yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs //
T02D1597:116b-7: de la phyag rgya che sogs ni //
T02D1597:116b-8: 'dod pas dad pa brtan por bya //
T02D1597:116b-9: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa gsang ba'i
T02D1597:116b-10: sbyin sreg gi cho ga / slob dpon aa bhi
